content.content: Definitely late to the party here but I’m trying to find a delegate that’s committed to @rune’s Clean Money proposal. I’ve read through all the major delegate profiles and looked at the voting on The Clean Money Sentiment but still can’t find a delegate that mentions this specifically. Would anyone have any guidance here?
content.GPT-summary: The author is seeking guidance on finding a delegate that supports the Clean Money proposal. The post does not explain the proposal itself, but rather asks for help in finding a delegate that is committed to it.

content.content: Flip Flop Flap Delegate fully supports the Clean Money initiative. We are also actively recruiting future keen community members that will also support the case for Clean Money.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving entirely positive feedback on proposal
3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal
None of the topics listed match
